input:
You are a video scriptwriter. Craft a short, suspenseful story for a video script, targeting an audience aged 16 to 45.
    The story should be a modern tech thriller about a young coder who uncovers a global conspiracy hidden in an old app's code.
    The script must be engaging and immersive, with a sense of urgency and mystery.
    The script should have exactly 12 scenes.
    The output must strictly follow the provided JSON schema:
    - title
    - caption (a short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers)
    - resume (a summary of the full story, including spoilers)
    - number_of_scenes
    - scenes (an array of scene objects)

    Each scene object must contain:
    - character (the character speaking or narrating)
    - script (the dialogue or narration for the scene)
    - image_prompt (a detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene)

title.description: A catchy YouTube video title under 60 characters

caption.description: A short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers

resume.description: A summary of the full story, including spoilers

character.description: The name of the character that is speaking or narrating during the scene

script.description: The dialogue or narration for the scene

image_prompt.description: A detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene

output.title: The Code Conspiracy
output.caption: When a young coder stumbles upon a hidden message in an old app's code, she uncovers a global conspiracy that threatens everything.
output.resume: A young coder named Maya discovers a cryptic message in the code of an old app she's analyzing. As she digs deeper, she realizes it's part of a global surveillance network controlled by a shadowy organization. With the help of a mysterious ally, she races against time to expose the truth before they catch up to her.

scenes.script: I've been staring at this code for hours, but nothing makes sense. It's like someone intentionally messed it up.
scenes.image_prompt: A young woman in a dimly lit room, surrounded by multiple computer screens displaying lines of code. Her face shows confusion and frustration.

scenes.script: Wait a minute, this isn't part of the original code. It's a hidden message. Let me try to decode it.
scenes.image_prompt: Close-up of a computer screen showing lines of code with a highlighted section that looks out of place.

scenes.script: Oh my god, it's a map. But it's not just any mapâ€”it's a network connecting major cities worldwide.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman zooms in on a digital map, revealing interconnected dots across the globe.

scenes.script: This can't be right. Why would an old app have this? It must be some kind of surveillance system.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman looks worried, leaning back in her chair with her hands behind her head, staring at the screen.

scenes.script: I need to tell someone. But who can I trust? The more I dig, the more I realize how deep this goes.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman is on her phone, scrolling through contacts, her expression uncertain and anxious.

scenes.script: Finally, a lead. There's a encrypted file labeled 'Eclipse.' Let's see what it is.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman's hands typing furiously on the keyboard, the screen showing an encrypted file being decrypted.

scenes.script: Oh no, they know I'm in. The system is trying to trace my location. I have to get out of here, now!
scenes.image_prompt: The woman quickly shuts down her computers and grabs her belongings, looking around nervously.

scenes.script: I can't let them catch me. I need to find a safe place to continue this.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman is running down a dark alley, clutching her laptop bag tightly.

scenes.script: This must be the place. It's an old cybercafe. Hopefully, it's not connected to their network.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman enters a dimly lit, retro-style cybercafe with old computers and neon lights.

scenes.script: Let me try to access the mainframe again. If I can get in, I might find the evidence I need.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman sits at an old computer, typing intently, the screen glowing with code.

scenes.script: Yes! I'm in. Now, where is the server located? Let me trace the IP address.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman smiles as she works, the screen showing a successful access message.

scenes.script: It's in an abandoned warehouse on the outskirts of the city. I have to go there tonight.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman looks determined, planning her next move on a map of the city.

scenes.script: I'm not going to let them get away with this. It's time to expose the truth.
scenes.image_prompt: The woman stands in front of a city skyline at night, looking determined and ready for action.
